name: Tutorial - Fleet Movement
description: Buy a carrier, capture an unclaimed star to win.

name: Tutorial - Infrastructure
description: Same as fleet movement, but no starting industry or ships and cheap economy/expensive industry purchases. Guide the player to buy economy to start getting income up, then Industry to start building ships before they can finally take the unclaimed star.

name: Tutorial - Technology
description: Same as fleet movement, but the player needs to research hyperspace range in order to get to the unclaimed star.

name: Tutorial - Combat Basics
description: Basically the current tutorial just with deeper explanation of things like the defender bonus, no specialist tokens yet.

name: Tutorial - Special Star Types
description: [Non-combat] Scenario where the player needs to get a black hole to see far enough to spot a wormhole that lets them hit the star count, etc.

name: Tutorial - Star Specialists
description: [Non-combat] Same as the black hole example, but the player must build a telescope array to see an unclaimed star.

name: Tutorial - Carrier Specialists
description: [Non-combat] An explorer to bridge a gap.

name: Tutorial - Combat Intermediate
description: Simple 1v1 map, but now with specialists enabled, guide the player to buy a Colonel and an Orbital Cannon at the beginning, enemy has a nebula, etc.
